name: Soul Tower
description:
WASD to move.

Space to jump, wall run, and hop from ledge to ledge. 

Try to collect all the fires for an extra challenge. 

For any interested in the climbing system, you can purchase it here:
https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/ja/slug/dynamic-ledge-climb-system

Note: This is a level whitebox, not a finished environment piece. I'd love to get any feedback you have about it.
